Text: what's the system requirements for this game. (I had the original i ran on my old 486 computer)...is this a new release, or a really really old game?

Incredible adventure indeed!
It's the original release (1995) but it should work with XP. If it doesn't you could try this one: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3904828
